content: dress your little holiday helper up in the adorable little helper crochet elf hat this easy crochet hat pattern is worked in the round in the half_double_crochet stitch making it a fast project to complete there s only one color change in the pattern so if you re a little new at switching colors have no fear **skill level ** easy **size** newborn 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months toddler child teen/small adult adult large adult **supplies** worsted weight yarn such as red heart super saver or with love size 5 0 mm h-8 crochet hook stitch marker yarn needle for weaving in ends © copyright 2016 prime publishing llc all rights reserved
